# Electroencephalogram

## Findings

Key EEG diagnoses and their associated findings include:

* NCSE
* Thiopentone infusion
	* Burst suppression
* Hepatic encephalopathy
	* Paroxysmal triphasic waves
* Hypoxic encephalopathy
	* Theta activity
	* Diffuse slowing
	* Burst suppression
	* Alpha coma
* Herpes encephalitis
	* Periodic sharp spikes
